item.title: The Fed has gone into hibernation. Tuesday may bring clues to how long it might wait to emerge.
item.description: Federal Reserve officials are clearly divided about whether higher inflation or a weaker economy is the bigger risk going forward.

item.title: ‘The bulls are definitely spooked’: Has silver’s stunning rise this year run out of steam?
item.description: Thin holiday trading, higher margin costs and other factors trigger silver’s biggest daily dollar decline since 1980.
